# BMI

BMI - PH448

## Requirements

[Docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/) and [CWLTool](https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwltool#install)

## Configuration

Specify input dataset path in [BMI-inputs.yml](BMI-inputs.yml).

## Usage

Run: `cwltool BMI.cwl BMI-inputs.yml`
